00022     template <typename T> 
00023     inline _xmat3<T>::_xmat3()
00024     {
00025         this->value[0] = _xvec3<T>(1, 0, 0);
00026         this->value[1] = _xvec3<T>(0, 1, 0);
00027         this->value[2] = _xvec3<T>(0, 0, 1);
00028     }
00029 
00030     template <typename T> 
00031     inline _xmat3<T>::_xmat3(const T f)
00032     {
00033         this->value[0] = _xvec3<T>(f, 0, 0);
00034         this->value[1] = _xvec3<T>(0, f, 0);
00035         this->value[2] = _xvec3<T>(0, 0, f);
00036     }
00037 
00038     template <typename T> 
00039     inline _xmat3<T>::_xmat3
00040     (
00041         const T x0, const T y0, const T z0, 
00042         const T x1, const T y1, const T z1,
00043         const T x2, const T y2, const T z2
00044     )
00045     {
00046         this->value[0] = _xvec3<T>(x0, y0, z0);
00047         this->value[1] = _xvec3<T>(x1, y1, z1);
00048         this->value[2] = _xvec3<T>(x2, y2, z2);
00049     }
00050 
00051     template <typename T> 
00052     inline _xmat3<T>::_xmat3
00053     (
00054         const _xvec3<T> & v0, 
00055         const _xvec3<T> & v1, 
00056         const _xvec3<T> & v2
00057     )
00058     {
00059         this->value[0] = v0;
00060         this->value[1] = v1;
00061         this->value[2] = v2;
00062     }
00063 /*
00064     template <typename T> 
00065     inline _xmat3<T>::_xmat3(const T* a)
00066     {
00067         this->value[0] = _xvec3<T>(a[0], a[1], a[2]);
00068         this->value[1] = _xvec3<T>(a[3], a[4], a[5]);
00069         this->value[2] = _xvec3<T>(a[6], a[7], a[8]);

00072     /*
00073     // GL_GTX_euler_angles
00074     template <typename T> 
00075     inline _xmat3<T>::_xmat3(const _xvec3<T> & angles)
00076     {
00077         T ch = cos(angles.x);
00078         T sh = sin(angles.x);
00079         T cp = cos(angles.y);
00080         T sp = sin(angles.y);
00081         T cb = cos(angles.z);
00082         T sb = sin(angles.z);
00083 
00084         value[0][0] = ch * cb + sh * sp * sb;
00085         value[0][1] = sb * cp;
00086         value[0][2] = -sh * cb + ch * sp * sb;
00087         value[1][0] = -ch * sb + sh * sp * cb;
00088         value[1][1] = cb * cp;
00089         value[1][2] = sb * sh + ch * sp * cb;
00090         value[2][0] = sh * cp;
00091         value[2][1] = -sp;
00092         value[2][2] = ch * cp;
00093     }
00094     */
00096     // mat3 conversions
00097     /*
00098     template <typename T> 
00099     inline _xmat3<T>::_xmat3(const _xquat<T> & q)
00100     {
00101         this->value[0][0] = 1 - 2 * q.y * q.y - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00102         this->value[0][1] = 2 * q.x * q.y + 2 * q.w * q.z;
00103         this->value[0][2] = 2 * q.x * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.y;
00104 
00105         this->value[1][0] = 2 * q.x * q.y - 2 * q.w * q.z;
00106         this->value[1][1] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.z * q.z;
00107         this->value[1][2] = 2 * q.y * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.x;
00108 
00109         this->value[2][0] = 2 * q.x * q.z + 2 * q.w * q.y;
00110         this->value[2][1] = 2 * q.y * q.z - 2 * q.w * q.x;
00111         this->value[2][2] = 1 - 2 * q.x * q.x - 2 * q.y * q.y;
00112     }
00113     */

00121             this->value[1] = m[1];
00122         this->value[2] = m[2];

00180     template <typename T> 
00181     inline _xvec3<T> _xmat3<T>::operator* (const _xvec3<T> & v) const
00182     {
00183         return _xvec3<T>(
00184             this->value[0][0] * v.x + this->value[1][0] * v.y + this->value[2][0] * v.z,
00185             this->value[0][1] * v.x + this->value[1][1] * v.y + this->value[2][1] * v.z,
00186             this->value[0][2] * v.x + this->value[1][2] * v.y + this->value[2][2] * v.z);
00187     }

00207     template <typename T> 
00208     inline _xmat3<T> _xmat3<T>::operator* (const _xmat3<T> & m) const
00209     {
00210         return _xmat3<T>(
00211             this->value[0][0] * m[0][0] + this->value[1][0] * m[0][1] + this->value[2][0] * m[0][2],
00212             this->value[0][1] * m[0][0] + this->value[1][1] * m[0][1] + this->value[2][1] * m[0][2],
00213             this->value[0][2] * m[0][0] + this->value[1][2] * m[0][1] + this->value[2][2] * m[0][2],
00214 
00215             this->value[0][0] * m[1][0] + this->value[1][0] * m[1][1] + this->value[2][0] * m[1][2],
00216             this->value[0][1] * m[1][0] + this->value[1][1] * m[1][1] + this->value[2][1] * m[1][2],
00217             this->value[0][2] * m[1][0] + this->value[1][2] * m[1][1] + this->value[2][2] * m[1][2],
00218 
00219             this->value[0][0] * m[2][0] + this->value[1][0] * m[2][1] + this->value[2][0] * m[2][2],
00220             this->value[0][1] * m[2][0] + this->value[1][1] * m[2][1] + this->value[2][1] * m[2][2],
00221             this->value[0][2] * m[2][0] + this->value[1][2] * m[2][1] + this->value[2][2] * m[2][2]);
00222     }

00225     inline _xmat3<T> & _xmat3<T>::operator*= (const _xmat3<T> & m)
00226     {
00227         return (*this = *this * m);
00228     }
00229 
00230     template <typename T> 
00231     inline _xmat3<T> _xmat3<T>::operator/ (const _xmat3<T> & m) const
00232     {
00233         T Determinant = m[0][0] * (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2])
00234                     - m[1][0] * (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2])
00235                     + m[2][0] * (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]);
00236 
00237         _xmat3<T> Inverse(
00238             + (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2]),
00239             - (m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2]),
00240             + (m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1]),
00241             - (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2]),
00242             + (m[0][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[0][2]),
00243             - (m[0][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[0][1]),
00244             + (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]),
00245             - (m[0][0] * m[1][2] - m[1][0] * m[0][2]),
00246             + (m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1]));
00247         Inverse /= Determinant;
00248 
00249         return (*this * Inverse);
00250     }

00254     {
00255         return (*this = *this / m);
